testsuite.name: FileServerTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Server started! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > exit The request was sent. Server started! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 2 Enter filename: > test_purpose_V7K9E.txt Enter file content: > UMGIAOFRG2O5O9COON The request was sent. The response says that the file was created! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 2 Enter filename: > test_purpose_V7K9E.txt Enter file content: > UMGIAOFRG2O5O9COON The request was sent. The response says that creating the file was forbidden! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Enter filename: > test_purpose_V7K9E.txt The request was sent. The content of the file is: UMGIAOFRG2O5O9COON Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Enter filename: > test_purpose_X1PHWO99.txt The request was sent. The response says that the file was not found! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 3 Enter filename: > test_purpose_UJCQKXUM.txt The request was sent. The response says that the file was not found! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 3 Enter filename: > test_purpose_V7K9E.txt The request was sent. The response says that the file was successfully deleted! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > exit The request was sent.
